messages.msgSnippet: I wish you weren t leaving NJ Ann!  I have also had the same problem and am still looking for a group, although I think that we will end up being loners in the
messages.messageBody:
I wish you weren't leaving NJ Ann! I have also had the same problem and am
still looking for a group, although I think that we will end up being loners
in the end.

Bonnie in Trenton


>From: Ann Ewing <sweeje@...>
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: May be moving to NC
>Date: Mon, 29 Jan 2001 18:46:00 -0500
>
>Thanks so much for the info! Lynda, your friend hit on one thing I'm
>noticing the more I research - I'm getting a strong feeling of exactly what
>she said - lots of fundamentalist Christian homeschoolers. I've actually
>run into that here in NJ - doesn't seem to be any "formally" organized
>groups that aren't also religious. It's gotten old fast. Anyway, pls
>thank your friend and I think I will contact her! Ann
>

messages.subject: Re: May be moving to NC
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks so much for the info!  Lynda, your friend hit on one thing I m noticing the more I research - I m getting a strong feeling of exactly what she said -
messages.messageBody: Thanks so much for the info! Lynda, your friend hit on one thing I'm noticing the more I research - I'm getting a strong feeling of exactly what she said - lots of fundamentalist Christian homeschoolers. I've actually run into that here in NJ - doesn't seem to be any "formally" organized groups that aren't also religious. It's gotten old fast. Anyway, pls thank your friend and I think I will contact her! Ann
